name: Aplowcalypse
description: Snow Plows vs Aliens: 4 player, local co-op chaos
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® XP/Windows® Vista/Windows® 7/Windows® 8 (latest Service Pack)/Windows® 10 Processor: Intel® Pentium® D or AMD® Athlon™ 64 X2 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 6800 (256 MB) or ATI™ Radeon™ X1600 Pro (256 MB) or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 / Windows® 8 / Windows® 10 64-bit (latest service pack) Processor: Intel Core™ 2 Duo E6600 (2.4 GHz) or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+ (2.6 GHz) or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT (512 MB) or ATI Radeon HD 4850 (512 MB) or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
